drawDown(address).details: Can be called by the account owner or on behalf of someoneDoes nothing when there is nothing due to the account

params._account: Target address that has had accrued ETH and which will receive the ETH

params._tagId: ID of the tagging event of interest

returns._publisher: Publisher through which the tag took place
returns._tagger: Address that tagged the NFT asset

mintAndTag(string,address,uint256,addres.details: Only a whitelisted publisher can execute this with the required fee unless the caller / sender has admin privileges.

params._hashtag: string value of the hashtag to be minted
params._nftId: ID of the nft to link from the above nft contract
params._publisher: the publisher attributed to the tagging
params._tagger: the ethereum account that made the original tagging request

params._fee: Value of the fee in WEI

tag(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.details: Only a whitelisted publisher can execute this with the required fee unless the caller / sender has admin privileges.

params._hashtagId: ID of the hashtag being linked
params._nftId: ID of the nft to link from the above nft contract
params._tagger: the ethereum account that made the original tagging request

params._account: Address of the account being queried

returns._due: Amount of WEI in ETH due to account

params._accessControls: Address of the access controls contract

drawDown(address).notice: Enables anyone to send ETH accrued by an account

getTagInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a tag event

mintAndTag(string,address,uint256,addres.notice: Combines the action of creating a new hashtag and then tagging an NFT asset with this new tag.

setTagFee(uint256).notice: Sets the fee required to tag an NFT asset

tag(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.notice: Tags an ERC721 NFT asset by storing a reference between the asset and a hashtag

totalDue(address).notice: Used to check how much ETH has been accrued by an address factoring in amount paid out

updateAccessControls(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the access controls

updatePercentages(uint256,uint256).notice: Admin functionality for updating the percentages

userdoc.notice: Contract that allows any ERC721 asset to be tagged by a hashtag within the Hashtag protocol
